bibl.title: Light from the Ancient East. The New Testament Illustrated by recently Discovered Texts of the Graeco-Roman World. Translated from the German by Lionel R.M. Strachan.
bibl.note: Deissmann Adolf, Light from the Ancient East. The New Testament Illustrated by recently Discovered Texts of the Graeco-Roman World. Translated from the German by Lionel R.M. Strachan.
Grand Rapids, Mich., Baker Book House, 1965, xxxii-535 pp., 85 figg.
